title: Login Error
body:
What is the deal ?!!!!

login error
 
The login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is not related to the League of Legends server. See our current Service Status here: http://status.leagueoflegends.com

If you are still unable to connect, please check the following Knowledge Base article: support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/234161-Connection-Failure-Error-When-Logging-In

Still unable to connect? Contact Player Support at support.leagueoflegends.com

replies.body: I don't think that link exists anymore.  o_o  The messaging is accurate though, in that your network might be having problems connecting to our authentication servers.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  That should help get you through the login screen!

I am having the** same issue **. I can finally connect after many attemps though.It only appears when trying to login on** EUNE** server.

In order to see wether its a problem on my end or the server has problems again i tried connecting on **EUW**.Guess what? **Zero problems** there, logged in and out several times without a single error...
**Eune has serious problems and its about time they got tackled seriously as well.**
